name: @apps/mcp-memory-server
description: Sophisticated memory MCP server with DynamoDB + OpenSearch + S3

scripts.start:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development USE_LOCAL_STORAGE=true MEMORY_MODE=local node dist/main
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development USE_LOCAL_STORAGE=false MEMORY_MODE=server node dist/main
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production USE_LOCAL_STORAGE=false MEMORY_MODE=server node dist/main
scripts.dev:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development USE_LOCAL_STORAGE=true MEMORY_MODE=local nest start --watch
scripts.dev:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development USE_LOCAL_STORAGE=false MEMORY_MODE=server nest start --watch
scripts.setup:local: pnpm run setup:env:local && pnpm run build
scripts.setup:env:local: echo 'Setting up local development environment...' && pnpm run setup:deps:local
scripts.test:local: pnpm run build && pnpm run start:local
scripts.test:server: pnpm run build && pnpm run start:dev
scripts.local:dev: pnpm run deps:up && pnpm run dev:local
